Articles.Content:
Look like a total shut down

5000 the k-sydrone kills ALL the kerbals.

None is left...
5000:the KIONICLES declare infinity years of mourning the kerbals.

you said that 600 is not when kerbals go extinct. that's because they go extinct in 5000.

5500: nothing has happened for 500 years except KIONICLES building memorials and calculating the one true location of the sol system to send a transmission.#

5589: the transmission is almost ready.

6000: the transmission is sent. it somehow splits and arrives at different points in time. danny2462 hears the part about the kraken when he is 10 and immediately stars worshiping it. scott manlesy hears a sciney bit. GreeningGalaxy hears a very complicated part.Images of the kerbal memorials inspire most modern war memorials. an image of a KEGO brick makes the first LEGO brick. BIONICLES are evolved from KIONICLES. the parts involving general history of kerbalkind hit in 16 forum pages worth of people and times of arrival. squad developers hear a lot of it.
... Ok, so we're just going to have the poor Kerbals destroyed and replaced by whatever the KIONICLES are? Ok then...

... Ok, so we're just going to have the poor Kerbals destroyed and replaced by whatever the KIONICLES are? Ok then...

the KIONICLES went extinct in 600 3 days after the signal was transmitted
Yep, this has been derailed (time to start a clean slate!!!)
But... the old one got through 59 pages and we got derailed at 16? Something tells me Kerbal History 3 will be even shorter.

Yep, this has been derailed (time to start a clean slate!!!)

Ok!
